meanings.definition: A plant of the stonecrop family, typically with fleshy leaves and small star-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The sedum in the garden had thick, juicy leaves.
meanings.sent2: I planted a sedum in my backyard for its beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The sedum seemed to be winking at me with its star-shaped blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a sea of sedum, each plant a tiny star in the earth.
meanings.sent5: The sedum's fleshy leaves stored water like little green sponges.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Sedum.
meanings.sent1: I saw a lovely sedum while hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The sedum in the botanical garden was labeled with care.
meanings.sent3: The sedum whispered secrets to the other plants in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent4: The sedum stood out among the other greenery like a silent sentinel.
meanings.sent5: The sedum's presence brought a touch of nature into the sterile room.
